## NIRawImageInfo interface

Node interface for raw image information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NIRawImageInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [channels](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.channels.md) | <code>1 &#124; 2 &#124; 3 &#124; 4</code> | The channel count of the image. |
|  [format](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.format.md) | <code>&quot;raw&quot;</code> | The format of the image. |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.height.md) | <code>number</code> | The height of the image in pixels. |
|  [premultiplied](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.premultiplied.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Does the image have premultiplied alpha? If present, should always be false as canvas-cleave does not support premultiplied alpha. |
|  [size](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.size.md) | <code>number</code> | The size of the image in bytes. If present, must be equal to width \* height \* channels. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.nirawimageinfo.width.md) | <code>number</code> | The width of the image in pixels. |
